#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t,k;
    cin>>t;
    long long int n,coins;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        coins=0;
        if(k==1)
        {
            cout<<n<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        while(n>0)
        {
            if(n%k)
                coins+=n%k;
            n/=k;
        }
        cout<<coins<<endl;
    }
}
